name: The Gardens At The Bewitching Hour
name_original: The Gardens At The Bewitching Hour
description:
"Lots of people disappearing in Grift these days.
Heard it always happens near the old gardens."

The gardens were an extremely popular spot in Grift, where people would come to relax and enjoy the variety of plants. Now it is nothing but weeds and despair. Only those who are haunted by the past, chasing a long-gone glory dare visit it. And then there's the mysterious Seedsman...

Come explore tragic nostalgia in this MÖRK BORG adventure! Created for the Album Crawl: Jam Session, inspired by the album Spiritual Instinct by Alcest.

The Gardens At The Bewitching Hour is an independent production by Jean Verne and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License. MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.

Art from the public domain.
